name: Acharya Shri Chander College of Medical Sciences (ASCOMS)

content.College Info: Acharya Shri Chander College of Medical Sciences (ASCOMS), located in Sidhra, Jammu, is a prestigious A- NAAC accredited private institution offering world-class medical programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through NEET and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery)

  • MD (Doctor of Medicine)

    Anaesthesiology, Anatomy, Biochemistry, Community Medicine, Dermatology, Emergency Medicine, Forensic Medicine, General Medicine, Hospital Administration, Microbiology, Ophthalmology, Pathology, Pediatrics, Pharmacology, Physiology, Psychiatry, Radiology, Radiotherapy, Transfusion Medicine and Blood Bank

  • MS (Master of Surgery)

    ENT, General Surgery, Obstetrics and Gynaecology, Ophthalmology, Orthopaedics, Anatomy
